translation.en: [man 1] Hey, Gibson. Come over here, mate.
Whoa. You still lugging that thing around?
[Gibson] Hey, I'm gonna be ready when Zorah Magdaros finally shows itself.
translation.fr: Je serai prêtquand le Zorah Magdaros se montrera enfin.

translation.en: I mean, you really think you're gonna kill a walking volcano monster with that?
translation.fr: Tu crois vraiment que tu vas tuerun monstre de feu avec ça ?

translation.en: This thing can supposedly level cities with a wag of its tail.
translation.fr: Ce truc est censé écraser les villesd'un coup de queue.

translation.en: Gibson, if half the rumors are true,
translation.fr: Gibson, si la rumeur est vraie,

translation.en: you may wanna count yourself lucky that it hasn't shown itself yet.
translation.fr: sois heureuxde ne pas l'avoir déjà croisé.

translation.en: -We're the Fifth Fleet. Best of the best! -[laughs] I'll drink to that!
translation.fr: - On est la 5e flotte. Les meilleurs !- Je bois à ça !

translation.en: Zorah Magdaros had better keep its head underwater
translation.fr: Le Zorah Magdarosferait mieux de rester sous l'eau

translation.en: because no one's met the monster that can handle Hunters like us.
translation.fr: car aucun monstre ne peut gérerdes Chasseurs comme nous.

translation.en: -[man 1 laughs] -[man 2] I have.
-[heroic orchestral music playing] -I faced an Elder Dragon.
You have no idea what we're up against.
translation.fr: Vous ignorez ce qui nous attend.

translation.en: [groans] Come on!
Whoa! Aw, come on.
Lucky catch.
Enjoy your breakfast!
Morning, Mrs. Bellflower.
Morning, Aiden. You're out early.
translation.fr: Bonjour, Aiden. Tu es bien matinal.

translation.en: You know what they say. "The early Kut-Ku catches the Konchu."
translation.fr: Vous savez ce qu'on dit :"Au premier Kut-Ku, le Konchu."

translation.en: [Bellflower] I did not know they said that. You and your monsters.
translation.fr: J'ignorais qu'on disait ça.Toi et tes monstres.

translation.en: [chuckles] Nice-lookin' catch, Aiden.
How about a Gastronome Tuna for some Poogie Jammies?
translation.fr: Un Thon gloutoncontre un Poogie en pyjama ?

translation.en: [man 1] Not gonna happen!
-Watch where you're going, Loke. -[man 2] Whoa! Nice move, Aiden.
translation.fr: - Regarde où tu vas, Loke.- Bien joué, Aiden.

translation.en: -You must be practicing. -[Aiden] You better believe it.
translation.fr: - Tu dois t'entraîner.- Ça, c'est sûr.

translation.en: Thanks again for clearing out those Bnahabra.
Hopefully, these patches'll keep 'em out for good.
[Aiden] Always "Bna-happy" to help.
[man 3] Hey, have you seen Farmer Burl?
translation.fr: Tu as vu le fermier Burl ?

translation.en: Ooh! Ebbi's been waiting for you there all morning.
[Ebbi] Something's gotten in Farmer Burl's coops. -Come on. We gotta go. It's a real quest! -[Aiden grunts]
translation.fr: Il y a un intrus dans le poulailler.On doit y aller. C'est une vraie quête !

translation.en: What if it's Rathalos? Did you know that Rathalos have poisonous claws? [growls]
translation.fr: Peut-être un Rathalos ?Il a des griffes empoisonnées.

translation.en: -Yeah? -One scratch, and you're a goner.
translation.fr: - Ah oui ?- Une griffure et tu es fichu.

translation.en: [chuckles] I kinda doubt a Rathalos got into Farmer Burl's Gargwa coops.
translation.fr: Un Rathalos ne s'attaquerait pasaux Gargwas de Burl.

translation.en: I'd bring some antidotes anyway.
translation.fr: Je prends quand même des antidotes.

translation.en: Yes.
Mrs. Genovan, look.
[Genovan] Is that my cast-iron skillet?
Just finished putting the new fence in last week, and now look at it.
translation.fr: J'ai posé la nouvelle clôturela semaine dernière et regarde ça.

translation.en: Tracks.
Velociprey, I think.
Can you take care of it?
Mr. Burl, you called the "Right-noplos" guy for the job.
translation.fr: M. Burl, je suis l'hommede la "Rhenoplos-ituation".

translation.en: Because Rhenoplos, it's a…
With the horn? Never mind.
[sniffs] It's fresh.
That's no Velociprey.
Come on!
[chuckles softly] That… That was close.
You're fortunate the Velocidrome was alone.
translation.fr: Tu as eu du bolque le Velocidrome soit seul.

translation.en: They usually hunt with a pack of Velociprey.
translation.fr: Ils chassent souvent avec les Velocipreys.

translation.en: Yikes. The tracks I was following were a Velociprey's.
translation.fr: Mince. Je suivaisles traces d'un Velociprey.

translation.en: Didn't think I'd be running into its big brother.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas croiser son grand frère.

translation.en: Are you a Hunter?
You are, aren't you?
Like, a real Guild Hunter.
The last time one came through Timben, I was, like, nine years old.
translation.fr: La dernière fois que j'en ai vu unà Timben, j'avais neuf ans.

translation.en: This is so cool. I'm a Hunter too.
translation.fr: Cool. Je suis aussi un Chasseur.

translation.en: I mean, well, I've never actually hunted something that can hunt back before, but…
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais chassé quelque chosequi puisse chasser en retour, mais…

translation.en: -I'm Aiden, by the way. -My name is Julius.
translation.fr: - Je suis Aiden, au fait.- Je m'appelle Julius.

translation.en: You shouldn't be hunting without a license from the Hunter's Guild.
translation.fr: Tu ne devrais pas chassersans permis de la Guilde des Chasseurs.

translation.en: -It's poaching. -[Aiden] I… Well…
One of them Velociprey…
translation.fr: Eh bien, un de ces Velocipreys…

translation.en: What are you doing?
One does not take a monster's life lightly.
translation.fr: On ne prend pasla vie d'un monstre à la légère.

translation.en: To do so would betray the balance of nature.
translation.fr: Ce serait trahir l'équilibre de la nature.

translation.en: A Hunter has an obligation to see its sacrifice does not go to waste.
translation.fr: Un Chasseur a le devoirde ne pas gâcher son sacrifice.

translation.en: Now, this village you're from, it's nearby?
translation.fr: Le village d'où tu viens est proche ?

translation.en: I'm not in trouble, am I?
I mean, you killed it, right? So…
translation.fr: C'est toi qui l'as tué, pas vrai ? Donc…

translation.en: Here's the thing. The last time one of the villagers
got an Altaroth infestation in their basement,
Mitul had to walk all the way to Dundorma. It took two weeks!
translation.fr: Mitul a dû se rendre à Dundorma.Ça a pris deux semaines !

translation.en: And then, when we finally met with the Hunter's Guild,
translation.fr: Et une fois devantla Guilde des Chasseurs,

translation.en: they'd never even heard of our village before.
translation.fr: ils ignoraient tout de notre village.

translation.en: There's no way we can go for help every time a Kelbi gets into the Cudgel Onion patch.
translation.fr: On ne va pas vous sonner dès qu'un Kelbipiétine un oignon gourdin.

translation.en: Ah. So you take it upon yourself to sort things out.
I'm actually pretty good at this stuff.
translation.fr: Je suis plutôt doué pour ça.

translation.en: Are these the Velociprey tracks you were following?
translation.fr: Ce sont les traces de Velocipreyque tu suivais ?

translation.en: Yep. Those are them. Somebody's still gotta deal with that.
These are fake.
What?
And from the looks of it, you have a Melynx to thank for all your troubles.
translation.fr: Et vu les apparences,c'est un Melynx qui te joue des tours.

translation.en: Oh. When I find him, I'm gonna--
translation.fr: Et vu les apparences,c'est un Melynx qui te joue des tours. Quand je le trouverai…

translation.en: Aiden, later. The village first.
translation.fr: Aiden, plus tard. Le village d'abord.

translation.en: But… [scoffs] This isn't over.
translation.fr: Mais… On n'en a pas fini toi et moi.

translation.en: [Julius] Is there someone who makes decisions for the village?
translation.fr: Qui prend les décisions au village ?

translation.en: [Aiden] Elder Daazel. She's a Wyverian.
translation.fr: La vieille Daazel. C'est une Wyvérienne.

translation.en: Lived here longer than there's been a village.
She's in the building with Huskberry bushes out front.
translation.fr: Elle est dans la cabaneavec les baies devant.

translation.en: -I can show you where it is. -[Julius] I'll find my way. Take this.
translation.fr: - Je peux te montrer.- Je trouverai mon chemin. Prends ça.

translation.en: -[Aiden grunts] -[Ebbi] Holy moly!
Keep an eye on that for me, would you, Ebbi?
I'll be back shortly.
Give it a rest, Feathers. I'm not quite ready for you yet.
translation.fr: Du calme, Plumeau.Je m'occupe de toi bientôt.

translation.en: Mm! A little Felvine for flavor.
translation.fr: De la Felvine pour le goût.

translation.en: Don't you move. You're gonna pay for what you've done.
translation.fr: Pas un geste. Tu payeras pour tes actions.

translation.en: Why, certainly, good sir. Uh, how much do I owe you?
translation.fr: Certainement, mon bon monsieur.Combien je vous dois ?

translation.en: You're a… Wait, you can talk?
translation.fr: Tu es un… Tu peux parler ?

translation.en: I thought wild Melynx only spoke Melynx or whatever.
translation.fr: Je croyais qu'un Melynxne parlait que Melynx ou…

translation.en: "Meowst" do, uh, that's true. But I'm not as wild as some.
translation.fr: Pas "moiaou".Je ne suis pas aussi sauvage que certains.

translation.en: I'm a merchant.
Nox is the name.
Really? Then what are you doing with Farmer Burl's--? [yelps]
Why, you-- Ow!
Oh my--
Yeah, just put that anywhere.
Just don't hit the--
Oh! Come on!
-That is precious cargo. -[Aiden grunts] Ow!
That was a limited-edition pot!
-What kind of-- Oh, real nice. -[Aiden continues grunting]
You "meowster"!
Come back here, you furry little felon!
I don't suppose I could interest you in an array of secondhand commodities?
translation.fr: Serais-tu intéressé par un vaste choix d'articles d'occasion ?

translation.en: [Nox, muffled] All right, 15, uh, 20%, but that is the best I can do.
translation.fr: Bon, 15 à 20 %,mais je ne descendrai pas plus bas.

translation.en: For the last time, I'm not interested in your Zenny.
translation.fr: Je te répèteque ton zenny ne m'intéresse pas.

translation.en: "Your Zenny." Listen to me, buying into this Bullfango.
-[Nox groans] Unnecessary. -[sighs] You're a thief.
translation.fr: Vraiment pas cool. Tu es un voleur.

translation.en: I'm a Hunter, and bringing you in is gonna prove to that Guild know-it-all
translation.fr: Je suis Chasseur, et te capturer prouvera à ce frimeur de la Guildeque je peux protéger mon village.

translation.en: that I can protect my village.
translation.fr: prouvera à ce frimeur de la Guildeque je peux protéger mon village.

translation.en: [Nox] Oh, I get it. You're a protector.
translation.fr: Je comprends, tu es un protecteur.

translation.en: -You protect. -That's right.
[Nox] Hear me out.
How much more effective would you be as a protector
if you could just protect them with your very own airship?
translation.fr: si tu pouvais les protégeravec ton propre dirigeable ?

translation.en: Now, I… I know a guy…
[Burl] Hi.
Well, Mr. Burl, I've solved your problem.
translation.fr: M. Burl, j'ai résolu votre problème.

translation.en: I think you'll be pleased to have these back.
-My Gargwa! -[chuckles] Nice, Aiden.
Heck of a good job, son.
-[Nox groans, coughs] -And the thief responsible.
Uh, hello.
[villager] Yeah, Aiden!
Still think I shouldn't be hunting? -Yes. -[Julius grunts]
translation.fr: - Alors, je ne devrais pas chasser ?- Oui.

translation.en: -[Nox] Oof. -What's all this?
I was just explaining
that your village lies in the path of an Elder Dragon.
translation.fr: que le villageest sur la route d'un Dragon ancien.

translation.en: What?
What does that mean?
Nothing good.
The Elder Dragons are the most ancient
translation.fr: Les Dragons anciens sont les plus vieux

translation.en: and powerful of monster kind.
translation.fr: et les plus puissantsde tous les monstres.

translation.en: Once enraged, incredible energy flows from them,
translation.fr: Une fois enragés, une énergie incroyable en sort,

translation.en: warping ecosystems in the places where they live.
translation.fr: déformant les écosystèmesdes lieux où ils vivent.

translation.en: [Julius] For the most part, these creatures remain in one place.
translation.fr: Ils restent souvent au même endroit.

translation.en: However, during the periodic migration,
called the Elder Crossing, they migrate across the continent
translation.fr: la Traversée des anciens,ils traversent le continent

translation.en: and over the great ocean,
leaving a path of destruction in their wake.
translation.fr: semant la destruction dans leur sillage.

translation.en: Based on our reports, we now believe they are all headed to the same location
translation.fr: D'après nos sources, nous pensonsqu'ils vont tous au même endroit

translation.en: over the sea, but we don't know why.
translation.fr: par-dessus la mer,mais nous ignorons pourquoi.

translation.en: [Daazel] For most of recorded history,
translation.fr: De ce que nous savons du passé,

translation.en: these events were extraordinarily rare.
-[people scream] -[Daazel] One in a century was uncommon.
translation.fr: Un par siècle n'était pas chose commune.

translation.en: It's now happening once every decade.
translation.fr: Ça arrive maintenant tous les dix ans.

translation.en: [Julius] Ten years ago, the Guild summoned Hunters to Port Tanzia to join a Fleet.
translation.fr: Il y a dix ans, la Guilde a crééune flotte de Chasseurs à Port Tanzia.

translation.en: Their mission?
To find the cause of the more frequent migrations.
translation.fr: Trouver la causedes migrations plus fréquentes.

translation.en: Hunters, like myself,
have been dispatched by the Hunter's Guild to search for signs of the next migration.
translation.fr: ont été envoyés par la Guilde pour trouverles signes de la prochaine migration.

translation.en: I am here to tell you an Elder Dragon is on its migration path,
translation.fr: Je suis venu vous direqu'un Dragon ancien migre

translation.en: straight for your village.
Holy moly.
You must evacuate now.
Wait a minute. You expect us to just pack up and leave?
translation.fr: Attendez. Vous voulez qu'on plie bagages ?

translation.en: How do we know any of this is even true?
translation.fr: Comment savoir si tout ça est vrai ?

translation.en: -We don't know you. -I agree. What about our homes?
translation.fr: - On ne vous connaît pas.- Exact. Et nos maisons ?

translation.en: -Did you think of that? -Homes? Homes can be rebuilt.
translation.fr: - Vous y avez pensé ?- Une maison, ça se reconstruit.

translation.en: We're talking about lives here. We should do as he says.
translation.fr: On parle de vies.On devrait faire ce qu'il dit.

translation.en: Some of us can't carry our livelihood with us, Navid. I don't trust this man.
translation.fr: Certains ne pourront pas suivre, Navid.Je ne lui fais pas confiance.

translation.en: No, I don't either. I mean, why should we listen to him?
translation.fr: Moi non plus. Pourquoi on l'écouterait ?

translation.en: It's true.
This valley is acting like a funnel for monsters fleeing the Elder Dragon.
translation.fr: Cette vallée fait effet d'entonnoirpour les monstres fuyant le Dragon ancien.

translation.en: -Most likely-- -Most likely?
He's just guessing!
I believe him.
He saved my life.
Aiden, he's not from our village.
translation.fr: Aiden, il n'est pas du village.

translation.en: What if I go up there and see this for myself?
translation.fr: Et si j'allais voir ça par moi-même ?

translation.en: Well, if you tell us the danger is real, I will believe you.
translation.fr: Si tu nous dis que le danger est réel,je te croirai.

translation.en: Okay. I will too.
Then you will evacuate?
We have to know.
Take me there.
The Elder Dragon will pass through the valley within a week.
translation.fr: Le Dragon ancien traverserala vallée d'ici une semaine.

translation.en: I will take the boy to see with his own eyes the coming danger,
translation.fr: J'emmènerai le garçonvoir de ses propres yeux le danger à venir

translation.en: but there can be no delay in your preparations.
translation.fr: mais ne retardez pas vos préparatifs.

translation.en: You must be ready to leave as soon as he returns.
translation.fr: Vous devez être prêts à partirdès son retour.

translation.en: We will begin at first light.
[Burl] This doesn't sound good.
What are you going to do?
-[Nox yowls] -Now, what to do with you?
I may have use for him.
translation.fr: Je pourrais avoir besoin de lui.

translation.en: -Have you hunted Zinogre? -[Julius] Yes.
-Diablos? -Yes.
Aiden, no!
I had that one.
These monsters are no threat.
translation.fr: Ces monstres ne sont pas une menace.

translation.en: They're fleeing the Elder Dragon.
There's something I don't get. How come the Guild gets to decide
translation.fr: Une chose m'échappe.Pourquoi la Guilde décide-t-elle

translation.en: when and what people can hunt?
A dead monster's a dead monster, isn't it? Most people once agreed with you.
translation.fr: - Un monstre mort est un monstre mort.- La plupart des gens pensaient ça.

translation.en: Ages ago, we hunted monsters indiscriminately
translation.fr: Dans le passé,on chassait tous les monstres,

translation.en: to the point where the natural balance of life was disrupted.
translation.fr: ce qui a perturbél'équilibre naturel de la vie.

translation.en: The effect on our environment was devastating.
It is this very reason that the Hunter's Guild was formed.
translation.fr: C'est pour celaque la Guilde des Chasseurs a été créée.

translation.en: Our balance with nature is more delicate than you think.
translation.fr: Notre équilibre avec la natureest très délicat.

translation.en: [Julius] Dual Blades.
They work separately, but always together.
Always on the offensive.
Overwhelming and outnumbering one's opponent like two unrelenting foes.
translation.fr: accablant et surpassant l'adversairetels deux ennemis incessants.

translation.en: The motion is fluid and precise,
translation.fr: Le mouvement est fluide et précis

translation.en: like the flow of a stream.
-May I? -Here. Try these first.
Concentrate on your center. You need a stable foundation.
translation.fr: Concentre-toi sur ton centre.Il te faut une base stable.

translation.en: Don't worry. We may make a decent Hunter of you yet.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas.On pourrait faire de toi un bon Chasseur.

translation.en: [Nox panting] Hey. Hey, guys. Wait.
Isn't this distribution of baggage just a little unfair?
translation.fr: Ce partage de bagagesn'est-il pas injuste ?

translation.en: [sighing] Oh God.
Nice armor.
[laughs] You noticed. It's 100% iron ore.
translation.fr: Tu as remarqué.C'est en pur minerai de fer.

translation.en: Velocidrome-tested. Works as a weapon. Got good balance.
translation.fr: Anti-Velocidrome. Ça sert aussi d'arme. Bon équilibre.

translation.en: Campfire cookware.
Perhaps you need to look the part.
translation.fr: Il te faudrait le bon équipement.

translation.en: This could fit.
[gasps, chuckles] Thank you.
[Julius] It is Guild-issue.
-Come here. -[Julius] Aiden.
Come on. Bring it in.
Um, no. No, Aiden.
It's okay. Don't… Don't touch me.
translation.fr: C'est bon. Ne me touche pas.

translation.en: In case you were wondering… [yawns]
translation.fr: Au cas où tu te demanderais…

translation.en: …there's nowhere you can run that I won't be able to track you, Nox.
translation.fr: tu ne peux t'enfuirsans que je te retrouve, Nox.

translation.en: [gasps] Say what? Uh-oh. No. No.
-[rustling] -[Julius] Mm-hmm. And get out of my bag.
[Nox] Who, me? I'm not. I'm right over here.
translation.fr: Qui, moi ? Non, je suis là.

translation.en: What?
I don't see anything.
[Julius] Quiet.
Run!
[Aiden] Nox!
Aiden, no!
Come on!
Climb up here!
That was the scariest thing I've ever seen.
translation.fr: J'avais jamais rien vu d'aussi effrayant.

translation.en: It can't get any worse than that. [chuckles]
Aiden, come up here.
[Aiden grunts] What's that smell?
I was incorrect. It's… -Uh, yeah, it's worse. -[thunder rumbles]
translation.fr: J'avais tort. C'est… Oui, c'est pire.

translation.en: [Aiden] Holy moly.
[gasps] What is that?
That is what you face.
An Elder Dragon.
An unbridled force of nature given flesh,
translation.fr: Une terrible force de la nature

translation.en: headed directly for your village.
translation.fr: qui se dirige droit vers ton village.

translation.en: Aiden, you have, at most, three days until your village is destroyed.
translation.fr: Aiden, tu as trois joursavant que ton village ne soit détruit.

translation.en: That's an Elder Dragon?
I've tracked it for almost a month. Your people must leave the valley at once.
translation.fr: Je le suis depuis un mois.Ton peuple doit évacuer.

translation.en: We'll never make it. The only way out is through the Everwood.
translation.fr: On n'y arrivera jamais.La seule issue, c'est par Everwood.

translation.en: -We'd run right into it. -Then you must go west.
translation.fr: - On lui tomberait dessus.- Allez à l'ouest.

translation.en: The Western Ridge is unpassable.
It would take two weeks to get out of the Elder Dragon's path.
translation.fr: Il faudrait 14 jourspour éviter le Dragon ancien.

translation.en: -What about the Guild? -They're too far away.
You said so yourself.
Aiden, you've seen the danger.
translation.fr: Aiden, tu as vu le danger.

translation.en: Convince your people to go west, and you may still save some of them.
translation.fr: Convaincs les tiens d'aller à l'ouestet tu en sauveras certains.

translation.en: Remain in the valley, and you will lose everyone.
translation.fr: Restez dans la valléeet tu perdras tout le monde.

translation.en: Wait, where are you going?
It is my mission to warn every village from here to the ocean to evacuate.
translation.fr: Ma mission est de faire évacuerchaque village d'ici à l'océan.

translation.en: Not just yours.
So, that's it?
You're just gonna walk away?
Well, what if we fight it?
What if we can somehow change its course so it doesn't destroy all those villages?
translation.fr: Si on changeait son cap,qu'il ne détruise pas ces villages ?

translation.en: We're Hunters. We have to do something!
translation.fr: On est des Chasseurs. On doit agir !

translation.en: An Elder Dragon is not just another monster.
translation.fr: Un Dragon ancienn'est pas un simple monstre.

translation.en: And you are not a Hunter.
Maybe not. Maybe I've been kidding myself,
translation.fr: Peut-être pas.J'ai pu me raconter des histoires,

translation.en: but at least I know what it means to be a monster Hunter.
translation.fr: mais je sais ce que signifieêtre Chasseur de monstres.

translation.en: I'm not gonna turn my back on Elder Daazel, Burl,
Genovan, Mitul, or Ebbi.
I'll fight with sticks if I have to!
translation.fr: Je me battraiavec des bâtons s'il le faut !

translation.en: [sighs] I bring him out here,
and he becomes even more determined to stay.
translation.fr: et il est encore plus déterminé à rester.

translation.en: "Care for nature, and it will deliver prosperity."
"Build from prosperity to craft a thriving community."
"Live harmoniously in that community
and teach it to always care for nature."
The cycle of balance?
Isn't that what you swore to protect?
translation.fr: Ce que tu as juré de protéger.

translation.en: That Elder Dragon is destroying nature, and it's about to destroy community.
translation.fr: Ce Dragon ancien détruit la natureet va détruire la communauté.

translation.en: If you leave, you're not just abandoning us.
translation.fr: Si tu pars, tu nous abandonnes

translation.en: You're turning your back on what it means to be a Hunter.
translation.fr: et tu dénigresce que signifie être un Chasseur.

translation.en: Where did you learn that?
This journal belongs to a Hunter.
translation.fr: Ce journal appartient à un Chasseur.

translation.en: Anyone within range will find us.
translation.fr: Tous ceux à proximité nous trouveront.

translation.en: If we're going to do this, we're going to need some help.
translation.fr: Si on fait ça, on aura besoin d'aide.

translation.en: Yes! It is "Alatre-on"!
[Julius] The last entry here is only two days old.
translation.fr: La dernière entrée date de deux jours.

translation.en: -Where did you get it? -I found it in Nox's loot.
translation.fr: - Où l'as-tu trouvé ?- Dans le butin de Nox.

translation.en: Who did you steal this from?
"Purr-cured" it, please.
Easy on the s-word.
Uh, the thing is, uh, my memory's a little foggy, so…
translation.fr: Ma mémoire me joue des tours alors…

translation.en: -Find the owner, and you go free. -[clicks tongue] Right this way.
translation.fr: Trouve le propriétaire et tu seras libre. Par ici.

translation.en: [Nox] This is "purr-ty" close to where I found the Hunter.
translation.fr: C'est "envi-ronron" làque j'ai trouvé la Chasseuse.

translation.en: She was camped here for the night.
You guys smell that?
This way. And careful.
The creature she's hunting is extremely dangerous.
translation.fr: La créature qu'elle chasseest très dangereuse.

translation.en: Buddy, if we run into trouble, plan A is run away.
translation.fr: Si on a des ennuis,le plan A, c'est de fuir.

translation.en: Plans C, D, and E are hide,
translation.fr: Les plans C, D et E : on se cache,

translation.en: negotiate, and run away.
There is no plan boomerang.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de plan boomerang.

translation.en: -[screams] -[grunts] Get out of the way!
-Hey, ugly! Over here. -[Kinsect buzzes]
[Hunter] Let's see what you got.
You're a lot faster than that last one.
translation.fr: Tu es plus rapide que le dernier.

translation.en: This is high.
Paisley!
[Aiden] Don't worry!
We are here to he-- [groans]
translation.fr: On est là pour vous ai…

translation.en: Ugh. Amateurs.
-[Nox] They're not coming this way. -[screams]
translation.fr: Ils ne viennent pas par là.

translation.en: [yelps] Oh! No, no, no, no!
[in slow-motion] Oh no!
Can't believe I'm doing this.
[Aiden] Help!
I got you, man. You're gonna be okay.
translation.fr: Je suis là. Ça va aller.

translation.en: -[Nox and Aiden screaming] -[Hunter] Seriously?
Okay, big guy. Let's see how well you fight.
translation.fr: Bien, mon grand. Voyons comment tu t'en sors.

translation.en: -Ha! You are a nasty one, aren't ya? -[Nerscylla growls]
translation.fr: Tu es un sale type, hein ?

translation.en: -[Julius grunts] -[Aiden] Julius!
[Nox] We'll be perfectly safe now.
-[yelps, groans] -[Aiden] Nox!
-[Julius grunting] -[Aiden] Julius! Watch out!
[Aiden] Whoa! No!
-[Aiden] Hey! I'm still up here! -Time for plan boomerang.
translation.fr: Je suis toujours là ! C'est l'heure du plan boomerang.

translation.en: No, no, no! No plan boomerang!
Sure, he gives me the weapon that comes flying back at your face.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, il me donne l'armequi revient au visage.

translation.en: Give him a big kiss for us.
-[Aiden] No. Shoo. Go away. No. -[Paisley buzzing]
I'm back in this.
I'm gonna flank him! [grunts]
I got a little problem here!
[grunting] Julius, I think I'm stuck, stuck in the gooey stuff.
translation.fr: Julius, je suis coincé dans le truc gluant.

translation.en: [groans] Hurry, hurry, hurry, hurry. He's coming.
He's gonna eat me. Hurry!
Watch out!
[groans] That… was so cool! That was so cool! Did you see?
translation.fr: C'était trop cool ! Tu as vu ça ?

translation.en: Guys, I can't hold this little fella all day.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas le tenir toute la journée.

translation.en: Oh man. I was up in the tree, and then I swung back. I…
translation.fr: J'étais dans l'arbreet je me suis balancé.

translation.en: I got a few hits in, and then…
Thanks a bunch, you guys. I only needed another few minutes
translation.fr: Merci, les gars.Il me manquait quelques minutes

translation.en: to ascertain its bite strength and leaping ability.
translation.fr: pour analysersa force de morsure et ses bonds.

translation.en: And those swords, they're gonna throw the data way off.
translation.fr: Et ces épées vont gâcher les données.

translation.en: -[Julius] You slayed it. -Your partner was in big trouble.
translation.fr: - Tu l'as tué.- Ton partenaire était en danger.

translation.en: And he's lucky this was a juvenile.
I would expect an Ace Hunter to recognize when someone doesn't need help.
translation.fr: Un Chasseur émérite devrait savoirsi l'on a besoin d'aide.

translation.en: Ace Hunter?
-[Julius grunts] -Yeah, him.
-You, not so much. -Hey.
Nice work, geniuses. [sighs]
Of course, nobody else takes the time to… [grunts] …obtain proper monster data.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, personne ne prend le tempsd'obtenir des données de monstre.

translation.en: Just leave it to Mae to do all the legwork,
then mess it up when she's almost done. [sighs]
translation.fr: et on gâche toutquand elle a presque fini.

translation.en: Here I was, thinking I was the only one following up on these reports.
translation.fr: Je croyais être la seuleà donner suite à ces rapports.

translation.en: No? Uh, why are you even here then?
-You're Mae, I'm guessing. -Oh! My journal. Oh! My notes. Oh! [kisses] Oh my gosh.
translation.fr: - Tu es Mae, j'imagine.- Mon journal. Mes notes. Je rêve.

translation.en: -I thought I'd lost you. -[chuckles] We found it.
translation.fr: - Je te croyais perdu.- On l'a trouvé.

translation.en: Uh, I mean, well, we found Nox, and he sto--
translation.fr: Enfin, on a trouvé Nox et il a vo…

translation.en: Hey, so, uh, should we be concerned about that?
-I'm up here! -[shot rings out]
Took me a while to pick up your trail after I saw the flare.
translation.fr: J'ai mis du temps à te repéreraprès avoir vu la fusée.

translation.en: Sorry I missed the party.
-Nadia. -Julius.
Two Ace Hunters.
-Today must be my lucky day or something. -You two know each other?
translation.fr: - Quelle chance j'ai.- Vous vous connaissez ?

translation.en: They assigned me the region just south of here.
translation.fr: Ils m'ont confié la région au sud.

translation.en: I spotted the smoke on the horizon.
translation.fr: J'ai repéré la fumée à l'horizon.

translation.en: It's headed right into this valley.
translation.fr: Elle se dirige vers cette vallée.

translation.en: It's a Lunastra, a big one.
-You've seen it? -Lunastra?
-As in, an Elder Dragon Lunastra? -[Julius groans] Uh… Ah…
translation.fr: Tu veux dire, un Dragon ancien Lunastra ?

translation.en: And you got close to it? What kind of a wingspan did it have?
translation.fr: Tu t'en es rapprochée ? Quelle envergure ?

translation.en: Was its mane more cobalt blue or closer to periwinkle?
translation.fr: Une crinière bleu cobalt ou pervenche ?

translation.en: [Nadia] Why the flare? Seems like you guys had this one under control. Wait.
translation.fr: Pourquoi la fusée ? Vous avez l'airde vous en sortir. Attendez.

translation.en: No. You're actually going to fight it?
-We could use your help. -Are you kidding?
translation.fr: - On a besoin de ton aide.- Vous plaisantez ?

translation.en: No one's done a comprehensive assessment of a Lunastra before.
translation.fr: On n'a jamais évalué une Lunastra.

translation.en: You know what we're asking.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qu'il en est.

translation.en: [chuckles] If that time with the Ludroth is any indication, you do a lot better with me watching your back.
translation.fr: Vu ce combat avec le Ludroth,tu t'en sortirais mieux avec mon aide.

translation.en: "Gargw-awesome."
-What the--? -Uh, he does that.
Hey, uh, I… I don't think that guy can breathe in there.
translation.fr: Il ne peut pas respirer là-dedans.

translation.en: Where… Where is that thing?
Did… Did you kill it?
Oh, thank you. You saved my life.
translation.fr: Merci. Vous m'avez sauvé la vie.

translation.en: That thing destroyed my whole caravan.
translation.fr: Ce truc a détruit toute ma caravane.

translation.en: You really want to take on an Elder Dragon,
translation.fr: Si tu veux affronter un Dragon ancien,

translation.en: we're gonna need a lot more than armor repairs.
translation.fr: il faudra plus que réparer nos armures.

translation.en: We're gonna need weapons.
Big weapons.
Uh, actually, I was trading with a smithy not far from here.
translation.fr: J'ai marchandéavec un forgeron pas loin d'ici.

translation.en: Name of Ravi.
I can show you where to find him,
translation.fr: Je peux vous y mener,mais je vous préviens…

translation.en: but I should warn you, he is not very fond of visitors.
translation.fr: Je peux vous y mener,mais je vous préviens… il n'aime pas trop les visiteurs.

translation.en: -[tools clanging] -[Nox laughs] What? Oh yeah.
I'm sure this guy gets lots of customers every day.
translation.fr: Je suis sûr qu'il a beaucoup de clients.

translation.en: Yeah.
-[bright orchestral music playing] -Uh, excuse me.
Whatever your business, take it elsewhere.
translation.fr: Peu importe ce que tu veux,va voir ailleurs.

translation.en: Uh, please. There's an Elder Dragon coming.
translation.fr: S'il vous plaît. Un Dragon ancien arrive.

translation.en: -We're trying to stop it. -[steam hisses]
We need some…
If you'd just forge some equipment for us, it can make a big difference.
translation.fr: Si vous nous forgiez des armes,ça nous aiderait.

translation.en: I don't forge weapons.
You'll die too!
This Elder Dragon you're so eager to confront,
translation.fr: Ce Dragon ancienque vous voulez affronter,

translation.en: its life can't be measured
translation.fr: sa vie ne se mesure pas

translation.en: by human understanding.
It has existed for ages
and will continue to exist long after we're gone.
translation.fr: et continuera d'existerlongtemps après notre départ.

translation.en: Compared to that, our lives are small, meaningless things.
translation.fr: En comparaison,nos vies sont dérisoires, insignifiantes.

translation.en: Maybe your life has been meaningless, but mine won't be.
translation.fr: Si votre vie n'a pas de sens,la mienne en aura.

translation.en: Aiden, go.
[Ravi] You, Hunter.
Did you forget how dangerous an Elder Dragon is?
translation.fr: as-tu oublié à quel pointun Dragon ancien est dangereux ?

translation.en: You're walking to your own death, and you're taking this boy with you.
translation.fr: Tu t'apprêtes à mourir,et tu emmènes ce garçon avec toi.

translation.en: He's not doing it for himself, and neither are we.
translation.fr: Il ne le fait pas pour lui,et nous non plus.

translation.en: Or did you forget what it means to be a Hunter?
translation.fr: Ou as-tu oubliéce qu'est être un Chasseur ?

translation.en: You were one, weren't you?
translation.fr: Tu en étais un, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: Not… for a long time.
Oh. What's this?
There's been a change of plans, everyone. We're not leaving.
translation.fr: Changement de programme. On ne part pas.

translation.en: We're gonna stay and defend our homes.
translation.fr: On va rester et protéger nos maisons.

translation.en: -And I've brought us some help. -Wait, what?
translation.fr: J'ai apporté de l'aide. Attends, quoi ?

translation.en: [Julius] There's a natural pinch point just outside the village.
translation.fr: Il y a un rétrécissementaux abords du village.

translation.en: If we can guide it right into that spot, we can set a trap for it.
translation.fr: Si on peut le guider jusque-là,on pourra le piéger.

translation.en: It's a one-of-a-kind Nerscylla stinger.
translation.fr: C'est un dard Nerscylla,unique en son genre.

translation.en: All kinds of uses.
-Sewing, walking stick-- Ow! -[stinger pierces]
…tranquilizer.
-[Ebbi] And this? -I scouted as far as I could get.
translation.fr: J'ai repéré le plus loin possible.

translation.en: -[Mae] She's a tough one. -Tracks all over.
Everything for 100 miles
has been stirred up by the Lunastra's migration.
translation.fr: ont été anéantis par la Lunastra.

translation.en: It may work to our advantage.
There are some things we need that we can only get from monsters.
translation.fr: Il y a des chosesqu'on ne peut obtenir que des monstres.

translation.en: Oh brother.
-[monster growls] -[Nadia] Here it comes!
-[yelps] Where are you guys? -[Aiden] Nox! Nox! Nox!
What are you doin' over there?
Nadia, now.
[Aiden] This way! Hurry!
[Aiden] No, Nox!
-Gotcha, buddy. -[Congalala groans]
Nice shot.
Mae, we're up.
Julius! Look out! Yellow Mushroom!
[Aiden] All right!
-[Congalala belches] -[Julius grunts] Look out.
-Whoa! -Yellow Mushrooms cause paralysis.
Set the trap.
[Aiden] Okay.
-Now! -[Aiden grunts]
[grunts] All right!
[Nadia sighs] Just like you drew it up.
[panting] Well done, everyone. That's what teamwork looks like.
translation.fr: Bravo à tous.C'est ça, le travail d'équipe.

translation.en: Nice deployment on that trap, Aiden.
Thanks. I didn't even need those extra anchors you gave me.
translation.fr: Merci. J'ai même pas eu besoin des ancres.

translation.en: -You didn't anchor it? -[groans] Come on.
translation.fr: Tu ne l'as pas ancré ? C'est pas vrai.

translation.en: Julius, it smells something coming.
Everyone, retreat.
No! We can't just let him get away.
translation.fr: On ne va pas le laisser filer.

translation.en: Aiden, now's not the time.
Julius, let me fix this.
-Nox, get that Yellow Mushroom! -What?
Are you crazy?
[Aiden] We can use it to paralyze the Congalala.
translation.fr: On va l'utiliser contre le Congalala.

translation.en: Aiden, disengage!
[groans] Stubborn kid.
Oh sh--
Nox! You good, buddy?
Oh no.
That can't be good. Julius!
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas bon signe. Julius !

translation.en: Oh no.
[Julius] Look out!
There's a big monster in front of me.
translation.fr: Il y a un gros monstre devant moi.

translation.en: [Nadia] Julius, stay down!
Gotcha. [straining]
[Nadia] Move it!
Since when did pickles grow teeth?
-Freaking Deviljho! -[slurring] Deviljho?
Hey, that's got a Dragon Element.
We could totally use that for the Dragonator.
translation.fr: On pourrait s'en servirpour le Dragonator.

translation.en: [groans, laughs] It is on, dragon breath!
translation.fr: À nous deux, haleine de dragon !

translation.en: -[Aiden] No! -Deviljho?
-That's a Deviljho! -Yeah. Welcome back to reality.
translation.fr: - C'est un Deviljho.- Oui. Ravie de te retrouver.

translation.en: -Julius. -Go!
[Nadia] Oh no!
Mae, we can use the mushroom to paralyze the Jho.
translation.fr: Utilisons le Champaralysie sur le Jho.

translation.en: Got it.
-[Julius] Get out of here! -[groans] We're a team!
translation.fr: Dégage de là ! On est une équipe !

translation.en: Paisley, go!
[panting] Got it.
-[Deviljho roars] -[Aiden] Watch out!
[Nadia] Got ya!
-[grunts] -Watch out!
Everyone all right?
Whoo! Did you see that? Did you see what we just did?
translation.fr: Vous avez vu ce qu'on vient de faire ?

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
I pulled off that sweet block you showed me.
Your recklessness almost got us all killed.
translation.fr: Ton imprudence a failli tous nous tuer.

translation.en: We would've been safe when that Deviljho appeared if you had just listened to me.
translation.fr: On aurait été prêts pour ce Deviljhosi tu m'avais écouté.

translation.en: When I command you to retreat, you do so.
translation.fr: Quand je t'ordonnede te replier, tu le fais.

translation.en: No hesitation!
I was wrong about you.
translation.fr: Je me suis trompé sur toi.

translation.en: For all of your talk of protecting your village, the only thing that you care about is getting your pat on the back.
translation.fr: Tu dis vouloir protéger ton village,mais tu veux juste qu'on t'admire.

translation.en: [Nadia] Don't you think you're being a--
translation.fr: Julius, tu es un peu trop…

translation.en: No, Nadia. I know what I'm seeing.
translation.fr: Non, Nadia. Je sais ce que je vois.

translation.en: This is not a team that I can lead. This was always a fool's errand anyway.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas diriger cette équipe.C'était une erreur depuis le début.

translation.en: Tell everyone to pack up.
Do you think being slightly chewed is gonna hurt the market value?
translation.fr: Être un peu mâchéva nuire à la valeur marchande ?

translation.en: [Aiden] I really thought I was improving. Now look at things.
translation.fr: Je pensais vraiment m'améliorer. Et regarde-moi.

translation.en: Hey, it's not your fault.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas de ta faute.

translation.en: No, I messed up again,
translation.fr: Non, j'ai pas assuré, encore une fois,

translation.en: just like getting myself cornered by that Velocidrome.
translation.fr: comme quand j'ai laisséle Velocidrome me coincer.

translation.en: [Mae] And ruining my Nerscylla research.
translation.fr: Et gâché mon travail sur le Nerscylla.

translation.en: And blowing the Congalala trap.
translation.fr: Et planté le piège du Congalala.

translation.en: Oh, and don't forget, almost getting us trampled, fried, and devoured by a Deviljho.
translation.fr: N'oublie pas qu'on a failliêtre piétinés et dévorés par un Deviljho.

translation.en: No big deal.
I'm startin' to think I'm not cut out to be a Hunter.
translation.fr: Je ne serai peut-être jamais Chasseur.

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh! And following the fake tracks I made. Yeah, don't forget that one.
translation.fr: Tu as aussi suivi mes fausses traces.N'oublie pas ça.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm sorry for that day.
For trying to hit you with a hammer, I mean.
translation.fr: De t'avoir visé avec un marteau.

translation.en: I'm glad I missed.
[Nox] So am I, kid. So am I.
-[Burl] Oh, Aiden! -[man 1] It's Aiden!
-[Burl] Everyone all right? -[Nox] Thank you, thank you.
translation.fr: - Tout le monde va bien ?- Merci, merci.

translation.en: Heroes, coming through.
-The heroes have returned. -[man 2] Hey, Aiden!
[Nox] Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Boy, are we hungry.
Do you remember our first hunt?
translation.fr: Tu te rappelles notre première chasse ?

translation.en: Gypceros, wasn't it?
It was the first time you hunted with a Gunner.
translation.fr: Ta première chasse avec un artilleur.

translation.en: You spent half the fight looking over your shoulder, trying to make sure you weren't in the way.
translation.fr: Tu as passé la moitié du combat à vérifierque t'étais pas dans sa trajectoire.

translation.en: So, when the thing flashed its crystal to blind us--
translation.fr: Quand la bête nous a aveuglésavec son cristal…

translation.en: Ah, I saw spots for weeks.
[chuckles] Not exactly the smoothest start for Master Kambei's prodigal student.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas le début idéalpour l'élève prodige de Maître Kambeï.

translation.en: Why did you follow me, Nadia?
Aiden made a mistake. He's young.
translation.fr: Aiden a fait une erreur. Il est jeune.

translation.en: His impulsiveness is a problem.
Says the guy who once charged into a Rajang's mating grounds unarmed.
translation.fr: Dixit celui qui a attaqué,sans arme, un Rajang en rut.

translation.en: That's exactly what worries me.
Says the guy who risked his friend…
translation.fr: Dixit celui qui a mis en périlla vie de son ami…

translation.en: his mentor's life.
That was not your fault.
We had enough on our hands with the Rathian.
translation.fr: On était déjà bien occupésavec le Rathian.

translation.en: Having a Kushala Daora appear right in the middle of it
translation.fr: Voir débarquerun Kushala Daora en plus de ça,

translation.en: was a one-in-a-million chance.
Nah, it wasn't that.
I made mistakes. The master had to come in and save me.
translation.fr: J'ai fait des erreurs.Le maître a dû venir me sauver.

translation.en: We were fighting an Elder Dragon.
I did it to impress the master.
translation.fr: Je l'ai fait pour impressionner le maître.

translation.en: [scoffs] It wasn't easy training with you.
translation.fr: C'était dur de s'entraîner avec toi.

translation.en: You were Master Kambei's favorite.
translation.fr: Tu étais le favori de Maître Kambeï.

translation.en: He saw something important in you.
translation.fr: Il a vu quelque chose d'important en toi.

translation.en: I saw it too, with the Deviljho.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu aussi, avec le Deviljho.

translation.en: We can't do this without you.
translation.fr: On n'y arrivera pas sans toi.

translation.en: -I'm not that person anymore. -[Nadia] You are.
translation.fr: - Je ne suis plus le même homme.- Mais si.

translation.en: That's why I followed you.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je t'ai suivi.

translation.en: Take my weapons.
Just, please stay and lead the others.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie, reste et mène les autres.

translation.en: Protect Timben.
I acted like a fool.
The people here counted on me, and I let them down.
translation.fr: Les gens comptaient sur moiet je les ai déçus.

translation.en: I know you won't lead a team with me on it.
translation.fr: Tu ne mèneras pas si je suis là.

translation.en: We will protect Timben…
together.
[Ravi] Hunters!
You said you needed a smith?
[Ravi] I built it to your design.
Congalala stomach should work fine for the steam housing.
translation.fr: L'estomac de Congalalapour le caisson à vapeur,

translation.en: Deviljho bones for the bow.
translation.fr: les os de Deviljho pour l'arc.

translation.en: Never forged anything like this. Can't promise it'll work.
translation.fr: Je n’ai jamais fait ça.Rien ne garantit que ça marche.

translation.en: If you're all finished, the village has prepared something special.
translation.fr: Si vous avez tous fini, le village a préparéquelque chose de spécial.

translation.en: You must eat.
What?
To Timben's protectors.
-Good hunting! -[Nox] Enough, already. Let's eat.
[Aiden] That journal of yours is something.
I think I learned more flipping through it
translation.fr: J'ai plus appris en le lisant

translation.en: than the rest of my time trying to be a Hunter.
translation.fr: que le tempsoù j'ai essayé d'être Chasseur.

translation.en: When I was about Ebbi's age, my parents made me write down everything.
translation.fr: Quand j'avais l'âge d'Ebbi,mes parents m'ont fait tout écrire.

translation.en: Needleberries, Flashbugs.
They were researchers. Sticklers for accurate notes.
translation.fr: Ils étaient chercheurs.Maniaques de la prise de notes.

translation.en: I hated it.
So, I got my Guild license
translation.fr: J'ai obtenu mon permis de la Guilde

translation.en: and accepted a quest that would send me out into the world.
translation.fr: et accepté une quêtequi me ferait voyager.

translation.en: Gone for two full years.
translation.fr: Je suis partie depuis deux ans.

translation.en: Figures.
I'm about to see an Elder Dragon, and suddenly, I'd give just about anything
translation.fr: Je suis sur le point de voirun Dragon ancien et là, je donnerais tout

translation.en: to be back sketching bugs and berries with them all over again.
translation.fr: pour pouvoir reprendre des notessur des insectes et des baies.

translation.en: "Zamite" be something wrong with you.
[chuckles] How come you always do that? Make puns out of monster names.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu utilises toujoursdes noms de monstres ?

translation.en: The village I used to live in was destroyed when I was seven,
translation.fr: Mon village a été détruitquand j'avais sept ans,

translation.en: overrun by monsters.
-[gentle music playing] -I lost my parents.
I spent a long time after that being scared.
translation.fr: Longtemps après ça, j'ai eu peur.

translation.en: Eventually…
I just got tired of it.
I figured, if I learned about monsters and made jokes out of their names,
translation.fr: J'ai réalisé qu'en faisantdes blagues sur les monstres,

translation.en: they didn't seem as scary.
Hmm. I'd say, "Veloci-diculous."
When I was in Val Habar some years ago,
translation.fr: Il y a des années, à Val Harbar,

translation.en: I remember rumors of a rogue Hunter.
They say he turned his back on the Guild's philosophy.
translation.fr: Il aurait rejetéla philosophie de la Guilde.

translation.en: Started hunting for sport,
translation.fr: Il faisait des concours de chasse

translation.en: taking trophies, and selling weapons to fund his habit.
translation.fr: et vendait des armespour s'adonner à sa passion.

translation.en: You came to me.
If you have something you want to say to me, say it.
translation.fr: Si tu as quelque chose à me dire, dis-le.

translation.en: A Hunter can easily lose his way in battle.
translation.fr: Le combat peut changer un Chasseur.

translation.en: Especially alone. When we go out there--
translation.fr: Surtout seul. Quand on se battra…

translation.en: I don't need a sermon from a Hunter willing to risk our lives
translation.fr: Pas besoin du sermon d'un Chasseurqui risque nos vies

translation.en: to redeem himself from past mistakes.
translation.fr: pour se racheter de ses erreurs.

translation.en: Past mistakes have a remarkable way of taking us down.
translation.fr: Les erreursont le don incroyable de nous abattre.

translation.en: Well, maybe tomorrow will be a chance
translation.fr: Demain, nous aurons peut-êtretous une chance

translation.en: for all of us to exorcise some very old monsters.
-[woman] Watch out! -[monster roars]
-[Mae gasps] -[Nadia] Move it.
Come on. I'm not finished eating.
translation.fr: Allez. Je n'ai pas fini de manger.

translation.en: -[Nadia] Everything's ready. -Time to kick some Lun-as-tra.
translation.fr: - On est prêts.- On va botter de la Lunastra.

translation.en: -Really? -[laughs] I actually liked that one.
Not the time.
Weapons out.
Whoa. She's huge.
-[Nadia] Cover your ears! -[Lunastra roars]
-[Nox] I'm out. -Nadia.
-See if you can draw it off. -Got it.
[Nadia] Over here, girl! This way!
translation.fr: Par ici, ma belle ! Par ici !

translation.en: She's not going for it.
[Nox] It's, uh, coming back this way!
Nox, go.
-[Lunastra growling] -Hurry.
Oh! That's a lot of rocks. How did that not work?
translation.fr: Ça fait pas mal de cailloux.Ça n'a pas marché ?

translation.en: [Julius] It's not going to leave the valley unless we make it.
translation.fr: Elle ne quittera la valléeque par la force.

translation.en: -[Aiden] And now it flies? -It'll burn the village down from the air.
translation.fr: - Elle vole ?- Elle va brûler le village de là-haut.

translation.en: -Ground it! -[Nadia] Coming in!
[Aiden] Oh no, no, no, no!
No!
My brand-new shield!
-Come on! -Look at this thing. It took me six hours.
translation.fr: - Allez !- Regarde ça. Ça m'avait pris six heures.…

translation.en: Forget about it! It was terrible anyway.
translation.fr: On s'en fiche ! Il était nul.

translation.en: [Mae grunts] You're a lot stronger than I imagined.
translation.fr: Tu es plus forte que je ne pensais.

translation.en: -[Ravi] Come on! -[blade clangs]
We're going to draw it into position.
Aiden, showtime.
Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up.
It's time for plan Dragonator!
It knows!
-The jig is up! -Hit it!
-[Ravi] It didn't work! -The fire damaged it.
translation.fr: - Ça n'a pas marché.- Le feu l'a blessée.

translation.en: [Julius] Use the snare traps. Hold it in position.
The firing mechanism is busted!
[Mae] Stop the leak in the compressor, let it pressurize.
translation.fr: Il faut arrêter la fuite, le pressuriser

translation.en: Then you'll have to trigger the Dragonator manually.
translation.fr: et déclencher le Dragonator à la main.

translation.en: [Julius] See if you can fix it.
[Mae] Hold on.
We can't hold this all day.
[Aiden straining] Almost have it.
translation.fr: On ne tiendra pas longtemps. J'y suis presque.

translation.en: You're welcome!
-[ropes straining] -[Ravi groans] I'm losing it.
Got it!
[Ravi] I've got you!
-[Mae] Ravi, get out of there. -Get it from this end.
translation.fr: - Ravi, sors de là.- Attaque de ce côté.

translation.en: It's jammed. Hold on!
-Do it! -Ravi, no!
-No! [gasps] -[Dragonator creaks]
[man 1] They did it!
translation.fr: Ils ont réussi ! Ils ont eu la Lunastra !

translation.en: -They slayed the Lunastra! -[man 2] I knew they could!
translation.fr: Ils ont réussi ! Ils ont eu la Lunastra ! - Je le savais.- Oui !

translation.en: -[man 3] Yes! -[Burl] Everyone, put out the fires.
translation.fr: - Je le savais.- Oui ! Éteignez tous les feux.

translation.en: [sighs] We did it.
Everyone okay?
-Ravi's dead. -[Mae] Oh.
-Oh no. -[Lunastra snarls]
That's not good.
We had one shot with the Dragonator. What do we do now?
translation.fr: On n'avait qu'un tir de Dragonator.On fait quoi ?

translation.en: There's nothing left to do but attack.
Give it everything we've got.
translation.fr: Donnez tout ce que vous avez !

translation.en: It cannot reach the village.
translation.fr: Elle ne doit pas atteindre le village.

translation.en: Here. Fight with this.
-[Julius] Hmm. -[Aiden] Wait.
Dual Blades. They work separately,
but always together.
-[Nadia] Hey, what the--? -Aiden, what are you doing?
I have a plan.
Julius, you have to trust me. I need time.
You'll have it. What are you going to do?
translation.fr: Tu en auras. Tu vas faire quoi ?

translation.en: Restore balance.
Did Aiden just run away with all of my ammunition?
translation.fr: Aiden est parti avec toutes mes munitions ?

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He says he needs some time.
translation.fr: Oui. Il dit qu'il a besoin de temps.

translation.en: No problem. Ideas how to do that?
-[woman] Watch out! -[Aiden] Nox!
Get everyone out of the village!
Oh man. It's time for plan panic.
translation.fr: Il est temps de passer au plan panique.

translation.en: [Julius] Fall back. Use the buildings for cover.
Julius, the villagers.
Go to them.
-I'm out. [grunts] -[Bowgun clicks]
Please work. Please work. Please work. Please work.
Please work. Please work. Please work.
[Mae] Go for its essence.
-[woman] The fire's spreading. -[Burl] More buckets!
-[woman] Hurry. We gotta get outta here. -I'm not leaving.
translation.fr: - Vite. On doit filer.- Je ne pars pas.

translation.en: -You have to get out of here. Now. -Here.
translation.fr: - Vous devez partir d'ici. Maintenant.- Tiens.

translation.en: -Oh no, Ebbi. You have to go. -[Ebbi] But I… I'm helping.
translation.fr: Oh non, Ebbi. Tu dois y aller. Mais j'aide.

translation.en: Here we go.
[Mae] Take her.
-No! Stop! -[dramatic music resumes playing]
-Mae. -[Nadia] Oh no.
-[Lunastra snarls] -[Julius] No!
[Nadia] It's dander. It'll ignite the whole village.
translation.fr: Ces squamesvont enflammer tout le village.

translation.en: Go! Go! Run!
[Nadia] Get out!
[man] No!
-[Burl] The Gargwa coops! -[villagers screaming]
[Aiden groans] Son of a…
Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark.
Ha-ha! Plan boomerang saves the day.
What was Aiden's idea again?
Go!
Watch out!
[Daazel] Your sacrifice will never be forgotten.
translation.fr: Votre sacrifice ne sera jamais oublié.

translation.en: Because of you, the balance of nature
translation.fr: Grâce à vous, l'équilibre de la nature

translation.en: can be brought back to this village.
translation.fr: peut être ramené dans ce village.

translation.en: Thank you.
There is no blame.
It was their choice.
They followed you into an unwinnable battle.
translation.fr: Ils t'ont suividans une bataille impossible.

translation.en: To treat it as anything less would diminish what they gave. And why.
translation.fr: Traiter cela autrement réduiraitce qu'ils ont donné. Et pourquoi.

translation.en: No. It wasn't me they followed.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas moi qu'ils ont suivi.

translation.en: They followed something larger, a balance each of us hope to find.
translation.fr: Mais quelque chose de plus grand,un équilibre que chacun espère trouver.

translation.en: -[Nox sniffles] -Here. This is Mae's journal.
translation.fr: Tiens. C'est le journal de Mae.

translation.en: You keep it. It has instructions to make that Rathalos antidote in it.
translation.fr: Garde-le. Il contient des instructionspour l'antidote de Rathalos.

translation.en: I made my own journal to start my own path…
translation.fr: J'ai créé mon journal pour débuter ma propre voie…

translation.en: just like Mae.
Timben will be in good hands with you here to protect it.
translation.fr: Timben sera en sécuritéavec toi pour le protéger.

translation.en: Hold up! Wait! [panting]
[exhales] Where will you go next?
The Guild will need to know what happened here.
translation.fr: La Guilde devra savoir ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: I want to come with you.
There's a bigger picture out there, beyond me, beyond Timben.
translation.fr: Il y a plus important que moi, que Timben.

translation.en: You taught me that the night we first saw the Lunastra.
translation.fr: Tu m'as appris çale soir où on a vu la Lunastra.

translation.en: There are bigger threats out there.
translation.fr: Il y a de plus grandes menaces.

translation.en: If I'm gonna face them, I need to become an Ace Hunter.
translation.fr: Pour les affronter,je dois devenir un Chasseur émérite.

translation.en: That's a good "hmm." I've known him a long time.
translation.fr: C'est un bon "hum".Je le connais depuis longtemps.

translation.en: And if I am translating correctly, that means,
translation.fr: Et si je traduis correctement, ça veut dire :"Aiden, tu as fait du chemin.

translation.en: [imitating Julius] "Why, Aiden, you've come such a long way."
translation.fr: ça veut dire :"Aiden, tu as fait du chemin.

translation.en: "I would be thrilled to take you on as my cadet."
translation.fr: "Je serais ravi de te prendre pour cadet."

translation.en: -[Julius grunts] -[Aiden] That's "ama-Zinogre"!
[Aiden] Hey, some people like my puns. Right, Nadia?
translation.fr: Certains aiment mes jeux de mots.Hein, Nadia ?

translation.en: [Nadia] That one was bad.
That was pretty fantastic.
Yeah, like that story about you taking on the Zamtrios.
translation.fr: Oui, comme ton histoire avec le Zamtrios.

translation.en: Hey, that really happened, okay? I came under it. I swept, all right?
translation.fr: C'est vraiment arrivé.Je suis passé dessous, d'accord ?

translation.en: This wasn't one of those stories,
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas une de ces histoires,

translation.en: was it?
Read this.
Wow. It's Mae's last entry to her parents.
translation.fr: C'est le dernier mot de Maepour ses parents.

translation.en: [Mae] I have enjoyed every moment of my journey.
translation.fr: J'ai apprécié chaque moment de mon voyage.

translation.en: Father and Mother, you have taught me well.
translation.fr: Père et mère,vous m'avez bien préparée à la vie.

translation.en: I think I understand now why this world needs a Guild
translation.fr: Je comprends enfin pourquoice monde a besoin de la Guilde

translation.en: and people like you to teach them how to live in harmony.
translation.fr: et de gens comme vouspour leur apprendre à vivre en harmonie.

translation.en: Tonight, I joined a team of Hunters.
translation.fr: Ce soir,j'ai rejoint une équipe de Chasseurs.

translation.en: The mission we are going on is truly dangerous.
I fear it may be my last, but interestingly, I'm not afraid.
translation.fr: Elle pourrait être ma dernière, hélas,mais étonnamment, je n'ai pas peur.

translation.en: For these Hunters I fight with are intelligent, caring, courageous,
translation.fr: Car ces Chasseurs avec qui je me batssont intelligents, attentionnés, courageux

translation.en: and they brighten my world.
My heart is filled with hope.
